response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its craftsmanship and utility. I am offering it to you at a special price of $750,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its market value. Please consider this offer carefully, as it is designed to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring my business remains profitable. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
